scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run deploy:client
scripts.build:shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:client: rm -rf server/dist/client && mkdir -p server/dist && cp -r client/dist server/dist/client
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/dist client/dist shared/dist server/node_modules client/node_modules shared/node_modules
